# Mod A on_actions file
# Load order: 2 (after vanilla)
# Adds events to: on_birthday, on_death
# Has conflicting: effect on on_birthday

on_birthday = {
    # MOD A: Additional birthday events
    events = {
        mod_a_birthday.0001
        mod_a_birthday.0002
        mod_a_birthday.0003
    }
    
    # MOD A: Custom trigger (CONFLICTS with vanilla)
    trigger = {
        is_alive = yes
        has_mod_a_flag = yes
    }
    
    # MOD A: Different effect (CONFLICTS with vanilla)
    effect = {
        add_prestige = 25  # Mod A gives more prestige
        add_piety = 5
    }
}

on_death = {

}

on_mod_a_special = {
